name: T-I Advanced Search Page Fix
description: This style fixes the „Single Content Type“ search page
additional_info:
This style has the following features
  • removes all Sphinx error messages
  • puts all search form elements in the right place
  • increases the height of the Forums selection box
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.torrent-invites.com/search.php") {
  
  body { color: transparent !important; }
 
  div { color: #ccc; }
  
  #torrinv-box { margin-top: -90px; }
  
  html .floatcontainer, .formcontrols .blockrow, dl.stats { height: inherit !important;;  }
  
  select#forumchoice
  {
    height: 200px;
  }
  
  option[value="8"],
  option[value="49"],
  option[value="48"],
  option[value="176"],
  option[value="18"],
  option[value="52"],
  option[value="15"],
  option[value="172"],
  option[value="174"],
  option[value="173"],
  option[value="14"],
  option[value="24"],
  option[value="13"],
  option[value="60"],
  option[value="81"],
  option[value="6"],
  option[value="183"],
  option[value="121"],
  option[value="28"],
  option[value="66"],
  option[value="104"],
  option[value="96"],
  option[value="68"],
  option[value="59"],
  option[value="56"],
  option[value="43"],
  option[value="11"],
  option[value="168"],
  option[value="41"],
  option[value="44"],
  option[value="17"],  
  option[value="8"]
  {
    padding-left: 15px;
  }
  

  option[value="184"],
  option[value="181"],
  option[value="62"],
  option[value="63"],
  option[value="92"],
  option[value="90"],
  option[value="107"],
  option[value="172"],
  option[value="173"],
  option[value="174"],
  option[value="113"],
  option[value="111"],
  option[value="108"],
  option[value="117"],
  option[value="105"],
  option[value="116"],
  option[value="113"],
  option[value="111"],
  option[value="108"],
  option[value="117"],
  option[value="105"],
  option[value="116"],
  option[value="179"],
  option[value="72"],
  option[value="19"],
  option[value="88"],
  option[value="22"],
  option[value="95"],
  option[value="125"],
  option[value="20"],
  option[value="170"],
  option[value="23"],
  option[value="39"],
  option[value="21"],
  option[value="54"],
  option[value="91"],  
  option[value="53"],    
  option[value="10"],    
  option[value="40"],    
  option[value="180"],    
  option[value="69"],      
  option[value="137"],    
  option[value="182"],    
  option[value="148"],    
  option[value="65"]
  {
    padding-left: 35px;
  }
